description.value: When a molydeus is killed, it's rune-covered weapon dissolves into a foul ichor. This thick, yellow-orange substance is valued by alchemists, but its also prized for its arcane properties. The substance is believed to magically enhance weapons.Use: A creature can spend an action to coat 1 melee weapon, or 3 pieces of ammunition with 1 vial of this demonic ichor. The ichor lasts for 1 minute, or until it successfully affects a target. A creature hit with this ichor must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take an additional 3d8 force damage.
